title: Didn't receive mission complete for world's mission.
body: I've done all the missions possible for the week including the master pass, but I only have 75 tokens.  I've completed 6 missions in total and I only have "A Real Challenger" left. I compared with my friend who I played all the missions with and he has 100 tokens and he completed "A Real Challenger" , yet I have not.

replies.body: No worries, the next set of missions should be dropping on Oct 2! We haven't missed any missions yet, the second set is just coming out a little later.
I was just wondering how I missed a mission compared to my friend because we completed them together.
Maybe your friend bought the mission pass and it was one of the bonus missions? Can't really be 100% sure without more details on what the missions were.
